root.name: Math Blaster: Episode 1 - In Search of Spot
root.description: The story follows "Blasternaut" as he flies through space converting trash into fuel and searching for his lost robot friend named "Spot." Spot has been kidnapped by a yellow three-eyed trash alien who is wanted for "space-dumping and Spotnapping." The player must use basic addition and subtraction skills to progress through the game. There are several different levels within the game with different objectives , but they all boil down to basic arithmetic problems.
